recipe.title: Spicy Hazelnut Sauce
ingredients: 2/3 cup hazelnuts (3 oz), toasted and any loose skins rubbed off in a kitchen towel
instructions: Purée nuts with water, garlic, salt, cilantro, vinegar, and cayenne in a blender or food processor until smooth. With motor running, add oil in a slow stream, blending until emulsified.
